text: The Georgian national beach soccer team represents Georgia in international beach soccer competitions and is controlled by the Georgian Football Federation, the governing body for football in Georgia. The team has played competitively in two World Cup qualifiers, in 2008 and 2016, but have yet to win a match. The majority of the current squad also plays for club team FC Dinamo Batumi in Georgia who have competed in the Euro Winners Cup.http://beachsoccer.com/teams/FC%20Dinamo%20Batumi ==Current squad== Current as of September 2016 Coach: Jaba Tchanturia ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup qualification (UEFA)=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Pos !Round !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|W+ !width=20|L !width=20|GF !width=20|GA !GD |- | Spain 2008 || || Group Stage || 3 || 0 || 0 || 3 || 4 || 26 || –22 |- | Spain 2009 ||rowspan=3 colspan=9|Did not enter |- | Italy 2011 |- | Moscow 2013 |- | Italy 2015 ||colspan =9|Withdrew |- | Italy 2017 || T17th || Group Stage || 2 || 0 || 0 || 2 || 9 || 15 || –6 |- |Total||0 titles||2/6||5||0||0||5||13||41||–28 |} ==Achievements== *2008 Season ** 2008 FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup qualification ***Group Stage *2016 Season ** 2017 FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup qualification ***Group Stage (T17th) ==Sources== * Team profile on Beach Soccer Russia * Team profile at Beach Soccer Worldwide Category:National beach soccer teams Category:European national beach soccer teams
